thread.title: See 2015 Chick-fil-A Kickoff Game and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85
thread.title_full: See 2015 Chick-fil-A Kickoff Game and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: See 2015 Chick-fil-A Kickoff Game and Stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85 provides affordable lodging to fans attending the Chick-fil-A Kickoff Game on September 5, 2015.
 ATLANTA, GA, September 01, The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport hotel North I-85 offers affordable lodging to fans attending the 2015 Chick-fil-A Kickoff Game in Atlanta on September 5. Louisville and Auburn will kick off the college football season in the Georgia Dome at 3:30pm. Prior to the game fans can enjoy interactive games, food, giveaways, and official pep rallies and team walks at the FanZone in the adjacent Georgia World Congress Center.
"We are a convenient and affordable lodging choice for football fans attending the Chick-fil-A Kickoff Game," shares Loree Rose, Director of Sales at the Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85. "The hotel's complimentary shuttle can take fans to the airport, where they can catch a MARTA train to the Dome. This avoids the hassles of driving and parking downtown," explains Ms. Rose.
This Hartsfield hotel received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence Award. Well appointed guest rooms feature free high speed Internet and comfortable Hampton Clean and Fresh Beds . Suites are equipped with a microwave and mini refrigerator. The hotel's refreshing outdoor pool is the perfect place to relax and cool off. Other property amenities include a fitness center, business center, and Pavilion Pantry Market for snacks and sundries. The delicious Hampton On the House Breakfast, with hot and cold favorites, is complimentary. Convenient Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bags are available on weekday mornings. Air travelers will find real time flight information for Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport displayed in the hotel lobby.
Current lodging specials at this ATL Airport hotel include Book Early and Save. AAA, senior, and military rates are available. HHonors members will earn points toward free hotel nights.
For more information about the Chick-fil-A Kickoff Game in Atlanta on September 5, visit www.chick-fil-akickoffgame.com . To book your stay at Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport North I-85, call 404-767-9300 or visit www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.com .
About Hampton Inn & Ste Atlanta Airport North I-85
The Hampton Inn & Suites Atlanta Airport Hotel is just north of Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport and just southwest of downtown Atlanta. The hotel is two and a half miles from the Georgia International Convention Center, four miles from Atlanta Expo Center, and 15 miles from Six Flags Over Georgia. Other nearby attractions include the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola , Underground Atlanta, CNN Center, Georgia Dome and Georgia World Congress Center--all less than 10 miles away from the hotel. The Atlanta Airport hotel also offers a broad range of services and amenities to make its guest's stay exceptional.
For more information visit: http://www.AIRPORTHAMPTONINN.COM
For all media inquiries, please contact:
Allison Reinert
